From: dcoburn@...

NOTE TO EVERYONE: I am new.  My bots' names are Hakibuscon and Skulletron. 
Skulletron serves the Alliance.  His beast mode is a Hyena.  Hakibuscon's
beast mode is a very sneaky/stealthy Chameleon.  Remember one thing about
Hakibuscon, HE DOES NOT SERVE ANY OF YOU PUNKS!!!  (I'm just kidding!  You
guys aren't punks!)  Just wanted to let you know that Hakibuscon is a
lonerbot right now.  Can someone please tell me LOTS MORE about the
Alliance?  I am not going to use Skulletron until I'm caught up with what
the factions are doing ok.


	Hakibuscon was walking through the jungle, and was getting very mad, as he
had to keep slicing vines.  When Hakibuscon was past all the vines he sat
on the ground for a while.  Suddenly, a huge panther was coming at him.  He
tried to defend, but the panther was too fast.  He had to do something. 
And then it dawned on him.

	"Vehicle Mode!"

	Hakibuscon was in vehicle mode, so now he was speedy as well.  He wheeled
out of the way and went behind the panther.  Then he shot 4 darts into the
panther.  Each dart jolts 500 volts into a target, so all 4 darts put
together makes 2000 volts.  The panther looked dead, just laying on the
ground.

	"Transform!"

	Hakibuscon went back into robot mode.  Hakibuscon lifted up the panther
and twisted its neck.

	"That's what you get when you screw around with me @SS#ole!"


How was that for my first post?  Sorry it was a bit long.  I crammed a
little too much in there.  Also, please let me know if cursing like that is
against the rules.  Next time, I promise I will make a shorter post. 
Posting long posts is bad RP'ing.  I was just getting carried away because
it's my first post and this RPG seems SOOOOO exciting!!
